property.name: hadoop.rm.queue.names
property.description: Comma separated list of queue names that are configured for this installation. Properties for a queue in this list will be listed as hadoop.rm.queue.queue-name.property-name.

property.name: hadoop.rm.queue.default.guaranteed-capacity-maps
property.description: Guaranteed number of maps that will be available for jobs in this queue.

property.name: hadoop.rm.queue.default.guaranteed-capacity-reduces
property.description: Guaranteed number of reduces that will be available for jobs in this queue.

property.name: hadoop.rm.queue.default.reclaim-time-limit
property.description: The amount of time in seconds before which resources distributed to other queues will be reclaimed.

property.name: hadoop.rm.queue.default.allowed-users
property.description: Comma separated list of users who can submit jobs to this queue. If empty, it means there are no ACLs configured.

property.name: hadoop.rm.queue.default.denied-users
property.description: Comma separated list of users who cannot submit jobs to this queue. If empty, it means there are no ACLs configured.

property.name: hadoop.rm.queue.default.allowed-users-override
property.description: If true, specifies that users in the allowed list will be able to submit, even if there names are in the denied list.

property.name: hadoop.rm.queue.default.supports-priority
property.description: If true, priorities of jobs will be taken into account in scheduling decisions.

property.name: hadoop.rm.queue.default.minimum-user-limit-percent
property.description: The minimum percentage of the cluster which can be utilized by a single user.
